item.title: NHL Awards Watch: Kucherov gaining on MacKinnon for MVP?
item.description: We polled PHWA voters to find out who's ahead in the major races as some new names have entered the conversation for the Hart and Vezina.

item.title: Who makes Mike Macdonald's defense so good? Seahawks to watch in Super Bowl LX
item.description: Devon Witherspoon, DeMarcus Lawrence and Nick Emmanwori are crucial players on Seattle's defense.

item.title: Who has the edge in Seahawks-Patriots? Barnwell previews every possible angle of Super Bowl LX
item.description: Can Drake Maye hit enough big plays? Which Sam Darnold will show up? And will defense define this Super Bowl matchup? Let's go deep on Seahawks-Patrio...

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Sterling in Napoli talks after ending Chelsea contract
item.description: Raheem Sterling is in talks to join Napoli, while Barcelona and Real Madrid eye Tottenham's Cristian Romero. Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: Real Madrid's big transfer questions: What to do about Vini Jr., more
item.description: January transfer window was quiet, but there are plenty of issues for the club to address in the summer.
